Lotru - Joy UI Dashboard is a premium dashboard template designed to help developers build modern, feature-rich applications with ease. Based on Joy UI, this dashboard offers a beautiful design and comes with a variety of pre-built components and modules, allowing you to create seamless and interactive web applications quickly. Whether you’re building dashboards for business analytics, e-commerce platforms, or internal management tools, Lotru provides all the essential tools for an efficient development process.

Features –
  • Built with Joy UI for a sleek, modern user interface
  • Supports Next.js v14.1 App Router and Vite versions for a modern development workflow
  • Custom authentication with options for AWS Cognito, Amplify, Auth0, Firebase, and Supabase
  • Forms built with React Hook Form and schema validation using Zod
  • Advanced charting with Recharts for data visualization
  • Animations created with Framer Motion for smooth transitions and interactions

products.name: theFront - Multipurpose Template & UI Kit
products.long-description:
theFront is a multipurpose React template that is perfect for building professional and modern landing pages, thanks to its wide range of ready-to-use Material UI components. Whether you're creating a marketing page, a personal portfolio, or a product showcase, theFront's components are customizable, responsive, and easy to integrate. The flexibility of its components allows you to create new pages effortlessly, enabling you to mix and match elements to meet your specific needs.

Features –
  • Over 70+ example pages
  • 300+ reusable components
  • Fully built with React v18, Material UI v5, and Next.js v14
  • 100% React hooks integration for modern development
  • Fully responsive, supporting all modern devices and browsers

products.name: Webbee Multipurpose UI Kit
products.long-description:
Webbee is a professional React UI kit designed to help developers quickly create modern, responsive, and beautiful landing pages. With a range of ready-to-use Material UI components, Webbee ensures a streamlined development process, allowing you to focus more on building user-friendly and visually appealing front-end pages. Webbee Multipurpose Landing Page UI Kit is ideal for developers looking for a flexible, feature-rich solution to create stunning landing pages with minimal effort. Its comprehensive design system, reusable components, and ongoing support make it a valuable tool for building both simple and complex front-end applications.

Features –
  • 30+ Pre-designed Pages
  • Utilize flexible and reusable components
  • Provides an aesthetic dark mode option
  • Integrates with Formik for smooth form handling and validation.
  • Includes lazy loading to enhance performance
  • Sections animate on scroll to add visual appeal.

products.name: Mira Pro React Material UI Dashboard Template
products.long-description:
Mira Pro (formerly known as Material App) is a top-tier React Dashboard Template that leverages the power of Material UI components to help developers build scalable and aesthetically pleasing admin panels. Whether you're creating a SaaS-based interface, E-commerce platform, or Analytics dashboard, Mira Pro is designed to save development time while ensuring high performance.

Features –
  • Material UI v6
  • Supports the Next.js features
  • Built with Vite
  • Ensuring flexibility in the development environment.
  • Comes with built-in authentication options like Auth0, Firebase, Amazon Cognito, and JWT, simplifying user management.

products.name: Materio React Next.js Dashboard Template
products.long-description:
Materio is a powerful and comprehensive Next.js admin template built with the latest Next.js v14 (App Router with SSR) and Material UI v5. Offering a sleek and modern design, this template provides developers with an elegant material design interface and unique layouts for various applications. It's perfect for SaaS platforms, eCommerce backends, CRM systems, and many more, offering a fully responsive and customizable experience.

Features –

  • 100% React Hooks & functional components
  • Ready-to-deploy folder structure

With a clean, intuitive design, this kit offers everything you need to quickly build dashboards for business applications, internal platforms, or consumer-focused solutions. products.name: uifort React Client and Admin Template
products.description: React Material Client and Admin Template
products.long-description:
Uifort is a comprehensive React client and admin dashboard template, designed with both developers and designers in mind. It helps build enterprise-level user interfaces with ease by combining Next.js and Vite support. With its fully coded components, multiple layouts, and seamless customization options, Uifort is built for efficiency, speed, and flexibility.

Features –
  • Optimized for speed, ensuring fast load times and a smooth user experience.
  • Customize your themes with light and dark modes
  • Ensures excellent display across various devices and screen sizes.
  • Built-in right-to-left layout support for multilingual use cases.
  • Pre-built templates
  • Secure user authentication with Supabase, JWT, Firebase, and Auth0 integration.
